sentences: ma pole elu sees end nii väsinuna tundnud kui praegu
ta on vana ja väsinud mees
context: Väsinud is an Estonian adjective meaning tired, worn out, or old. It's the past participle of 'väsima' (to get tired; to fatigue). The word can be used to describe both people who need rest/sleep and objects that are worn from use. It has various grammatical forms including väsinu (genitive), väsinut (partitive), väsinum (comparative), and kõige väsinum (superlative).
